'''0.0.18a_02''' is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 14, 2009 at 09:53 UTC, which added support for characters {{code|\|{{!}}|@|$|d=and}} and fixes performance issues from [[Java Edition Classic 0.0.18a|0.0.18a]].<ref name="blog">{{link |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170205202506/https://notch.tumblr.com/post/123333539/client-0018a02-is-up|title=Client 0.0.18a_02 is up |website=The Word of Notch |date=June 14, 2009}}</ref><ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''A4:54:18 <Notch> ok, new client up, with fixed font so you can tell an I from an l, the ability to say @, |, \ and $ in the chat, and probably better framerate''" (09:54:18 UTC)</ref>

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Font]]'''
* Added support for characters {{code|\|{{!}}|@|$|d=and}}.<ref name="blog"/>

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Font]]'''
* Characters {{code|{|}|I|d=and}} now display differently.<ref name="blog"/>

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed an unstable FPS problem.<ref name="blog"/>
* Fixed [[water]] graphical glitch on the corners of blocks.{{verify|type=change}}
